sentences.sContent: Is he, you know, like some kind of weird simpleton?
sentences.sContent_eng: Is he, you know, like some kind of weird simpleton?
sentences.sCn: 那个谁，你知道吗，像古怪的傻子似的是谁？

sentences.sContent: He looked at me as if I were a simpleton.
sentences.sContent_eng: He looked at me as if I were a simpleton.
sentences.sCn: 他看着我的样子就好像我是个傻子。

trans.tranOther: someone who has a very low level of intelligence
